Discovery+ launches today with content from HGTV, BBC, Food Network, TLC, ID, OWN, Travel Channel, Discovery, and Animal Planet, including a selection of 4K content on Apple TV 4K and FireTV.

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Queen's 95th birthday to be marked by new coin - Sky News
articles.description: The coin features the royal cypher "EIIR", and the words "my heart and my devotion", referencing her 1957 Christmas broadcast.
